ygData.subject: Potter site
ygData.msgSnippet: Does anyone know of a really good potter site?  I was wondering or have been asked how to make small dieties.  I m certain I ve met one person who has made
ygData.messageBody:
Does anyone know of a really good potter site? I was wondering or have been
asked how to make small dieties. I'm certain I've met one person who has made
them before (but I wasn't a potter back then). Does someone have the recipe
for that? Also what is the highest skill level achieved at pottery so far?
Any suggestions for pricing poison vials? I'm waivering between 1pp and 2pp
for regular ones.

Thanks - Tanana, Bristlebane
Master Potter
Master Brewer
Excellant Beggar
